sentences.en: Is this room soundproof? You know, I couldn't stand too much noise.
sentences.cn: 这个房间隔音 么,你要知道, 我不喜欢太吵的地方.

sentences.en: So in 1954 Hebbs built a dark, soundproof cell at McGill University in Montreal.
sentences.cn: 1954年,赫伯斯为此在蒙特利尔麦吉尔大学搭建了一间避光隔音的小房间.

sentences.en: The testing methods and evaluating parameters of soundproof property of textile were presented in this paper.
sentences.cn: 本文提出了纺织品隔声性能的测试方法和评价指标,探讨了织物结构参数对隔声性能的影响.

sentences.en: These boxes were usually old freight cars that were almost soundproof.
sentences.cn: 这些包厢通常采用几乎能隔音的旧火车货柜.

sentences.en: We need to buy soundproof glass to decorate our new houseswheresis located near the flight airport.
sentences.cn: 因为新家在飞机场附近,我们需要买些隔音的玻璃来装修我们的新房.
我们为家庭录音间装了隔音设备。

trans.tran_en: a soundproof wall, room etc is one that sound cannot pass through or into
